title: Squirrelphone
alt: After a while, the squirrel starts making that beeping noise and doesn't stop until it hops back up onto the stump.
transcript:
[Cueball is approaching a stump with a squirrel perched on it. A ringing noise is coming from the squirrel's back.]
Squirrel: Riiiiing
Squirrel: Riiiiiing[Cueball has picked up the squirrel and is holding it to his left ear.]
Cueball: Hello?[The squirrel bites Cueball's head.]
Squirrel: Chomp!
Cueball: Ow![Cueball holds his hand to his cheek while the squirrel leaps away, fleeing.]
Cueball:Â ???
